snippet: Manchester United pay the highest wages in world football, according to the latest edition of the Global Sports Salaries Survey....

headline.main: Man United Are Football's Top Payers, Says Survey
headline.print_headline: Man United Are Football's Top Payers, Says Survey

lead_paragraph: Manchester United pay the highest wages in world football, according to the latest edition of the Global Sports Salaries Survey.

snippet: Crystal Palace have signed defender James Tomkins from West Ham United for 10 million pounds ($13.06 million), the Premier League club said on Twitter on Tuesday....

headline.main: Palace Sign Tomkins From West Ham
headline.print_headline: Palace Sign Tomkins From West Ham

lead_paragraph: Crystal Palace have signed defender James Tomkins from West Ham United for 10 million pounds ($13.06 million), the Premier League club said on Twitter on Tuesday.

snippet: Leicester City goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel is back in training after fracturing his hand at the start of November, giving his side a boost for Saturday's Premier League trip to Stoke City....

headline.main: Schmeichel Close to Leicester Return From Broken Hand
headline.print_headline: Schmeichel Close to Leicester Return From Broken Hand

lead_paragraph: Leicester City goalkeeper Kasper Schmeichel is back in training after fracturing his hand at the start of November, giving his side a boost for Saturday's Premier League trip to Stoke City.

snippet: Former England international Ashley Cole and AS Roma have agreed to part company and the defender is expected to move to Major League Soccer (MLS) side LA Galaxy, Italian media reported on Saturday....

headline.main: Cole and Roma Part Company by Mutual Agreement
headline.print_headline: Cole and Roma Part Company by Mutual Agreement

lead_paragraph: Former England international Ashley Cole and AS Roma have agreed to part company and the defender is expected to move to Major League Soccer (MLS) side LA Galaxy, Italian media reported on Saturday.

snippet: AS Roma have signed Arsenal goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny on loan for a second year....

headline.main: Roma Sign Goalkeeper Szczesny on Loan for Another Year
headline.print_headline: Roma Sign Goalkeeper Szczesny on Loan for Another Year

lead_paragraph: AS Roma have signed Arsenal goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny on loan for a second year.

snippet: Everton have been dealt an injury blow ahead of the new Premier League season, as midfielder Muhamed Besic has ruled himself out for six months after picking up an injury during Wayne Rooney's testimonial game....

headline.main: Besic Rules Himself Out for Six Months With Injury
headline.print_headline: Besic Rules Himself Out for Six Months With Injury

lead_paragraph: Everton have been dealt an injury blow ahead of the new Premier League season, as midfielder Muhamed Besic has ruled himself out for six months after picking up an injury during Wayne Rooney's testimonial game.

snippet: Aston Villa defender Jose Angel Crespo has joined Spanish club Rayo Vallecano on loan until the end of the season, the Premier League Club has said....

headline.main: Villa Send Defender Crespo Back to Spain on Loan
headline.print_headline: Villa Send Defender Crespo Back to Spain on Loan

lead_paragraph: Aston Villa defender Jose Angel Crespo has joined Spanish club Rayo Vallecano on loan until the end of the season, the Premier League Club has said.

snippet: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne says he is versatile enough to adjust to manager Pep Guardiola's constant tactical changes....

headline.main: Versatile De Bruyne at Home With Guardiola's Tactical Tinkering
headline.print_headline: Versatile De Bruyne at Home With Guardiola's Tactical Tinkering

lead_paragraph: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne says he is versatile enough to adjust to manager Pep Guardiola's constant tactical changes.

snippet: Leicester City will be without Kasper Schmeichel for an extended spell after the goalkeeper fractured his hand during Wednesday night's goalless draw with FC Copenhagen, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Leicester Keeper Schmeichel Out With Fractured Hand
headline.print_headline: Leicester Keeper Schmeichel Out With Fractured Hand

lead_paragraph: Leicester City will be without Kasper Schmeichel for an extended spell after the goalkeeper fractured his hand during Wednesday night's goalless draw with FC Copenhagen, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: Southampton new boy Sofiane Boufal could make his debut for the English Premier League side after he was named in the squad for Thursday's Europa League clash at Inter Milan....

headline.main: Boufal in Southampton Squad for Inter Milan Clash
headline.print_headline: Boufal in Southampton Squad for Inter Milan Clash

lead_paragraph: Southampton new boy Sofiane Boufal could make his debut for the English Premier League side after he was named in the squad for Thursday's Europa League clash at Inter Milan.
